alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 19 at 2:29AM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Bitter Cold Temperatures Moving In... .Temperatures continue to fall early this morning and combined with strong northwest winds, wind chill values were already 10 to 20 below zero in parts of southeast Minnesota and far northern Iowa. Even colder conditions are on tap for later tonight into Thursday morning. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
